[[Budgeford]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1226}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Brandybuck Family|Brandybuck]] | parentage=[[Sadoc Brandybuck]] | siblings=two brothers | spouse=[[Gundabald Bolger]] | children=[[Theobald Bolger]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Salvia Bolger, n√©e Brandybuck''', was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Salvia was the third child and first daughter of [[Sadoc Brandybuck]].{{App|Brandybuck}} She married [[Gundabald Bolger]] and had one son, [[Theobald Bolger]].{{App|Bolger}} ==Etymology== [http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/salvia#Latin Salvia] is the latin name for [[wikipedia:Salvia|Sage]]. {{References}} [[Category:Bolger]] [[Category:Brandybuck]] [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Greco-Roman names]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Salvia Bolger]] [[fi:Salvia Rankkibuk]] [[fr:/encyclo/personnages/hobbits/brandebouc/salvia_brandebouc]]
